MessageSubject: You have been invited to join SIIWII by {param3} {param4}
MessageBody:
Hello,

{param3} {param4} is happy to invite you to become part of the SIIWII community to start connecting and collaborating with them and like - minded businesses in the apparel and fashion industry.

Ready to get started? Click the link below to set up your account to start connecting, collaborating and transacting.
{param2}/account/register?Tenantid={param5}&TenantName={param1}

We look forward to welcoming you as a new member of the SIIWII community.

Best regards

The SIIWII team
